name: Happyville (itch) (BeanSprot) (BeanSprot)
description:
In the prototype stage

Youtube channel where I post updates to the game:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVas4hBJ3Y4oLk5P_63G8LQ

Discord server for the community: https://discord.gg/TwSRzZ5BD3

Happyville is a casual 2d tile-based game in development.

Controls: WASD: movemen, Space: continue, Escape: exit UI, I: open inventory

Press space to reel in a fish
